content: EDR Visit meera motors to handover one df docus and discuss more cf files and car listing. Repayment recd from vighanharta motors. Repayment recd from m.r.motors borivali. Stock audit recd from m.r. motors borivali. One disbursement done today. 2 customars backout. Followup one file under process. Followup other dealers for cf files. Thanks regards

Visit M.R.MOTORS borivali to handover one df docus and to collect one df docus and discuss about cf files and car listing. Visit namah road wheels to collect one CF docus and discuss about car listing. Recd one new file from namah road wheels. One file disbursed. Followup 2 files under process. Followup repayment with decent carz. He is trying to get payment. Followup dream car hub for payment. Thanks regards

EDR Visit vighanharta motors to handover one df docus and collected one df docus and discuss about cf cases and car listing he did maximum rest he will do. Handover one cf disbursement docus ti sunil at andheri stn to handover to rto parson Followup 3 files under process with bankars. Followup dealers for more files and requisting to do more listing explaining them there benefits. Followup repayment of decent carz promise to pay part payment.

EDR Visit decent carz for df repayment he did part payment. Recd one new file from meera motors Followup 4 files under process with bankars. Followup stock audit with s car mall and aarya cars. Followup car listing with more dealers Thanks regards

EDR followup repayment of decent carz to complete soon. Promise to pay very soon. Followup repayment of aarya cars will pay by 2maro evening. 2 files rejected by bankars not upto the mark. 2 files under process 1 docus of each file pending will revieve 2maro chances for approval. 2nd half i was in hospital for my retina green lager surgery. Thanks regards

Visit meera motors to collect one df docus and discuss about cf files and car listing. Visit aarya cars to handover one df docus and discuss about files and car listing. He shifted at new place and busy to start the work there. Followup repayment of decent carz and force him to pay he is arranging to pay. Followup 3 files under process with bankers and dealers Followup other dealers to get new files Followup dream car hub but he did not pickup the phone i was in meera road only then i called up police inspector i told him everything and requist him to issue FIR he said come in monday.

EDR Visit aarya cars yo handover one df docus. Visit meera rd police station and met inspector again and requested him to take some serious action he called him up and gave 2 days more to clear the matter. Visit decent carz for repayment and stock audit and he promise to clear all dues this week. Recd one new file from meera motors. Followup all 4 files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Visit decent carz again today to request him to pay early as possible. Followup stock audit with s car mall. Followup all running files with bankars dealers and customars Followup more dealers to discuss about df and cf both. Thanks regards

EDR Visit aarya cars meera road to collect 2 df docus and discuss about cf bussiness. Followup decent carz to remind about df payment. Followup s car mall for repayment reaching 60 days soon. Recd one new file from aarya cars. Followup 4 files under process with bankars and trying hard to make all files approved. Followup dream car hub for repayment. Followup rest dealers for df and cf cases. Thanks regards

EDR visit meera rd police waited till 3 but he did not come and sent docus by someone else i fought with him on and explain everthing to inspector he called up then he said to come in evening i left the paper with insp to sign.now 2maro i will ask to inspector he sign or not. One file approved may be 2maro will be disburse. Followup 3 files under process with bankars Followup repayment with decent carz.

EDR Visit decent carz to handover one df docus. 3 more to close i made him understand to close early as possible. He trying his level best vehicles with him only i asked him cf files. Followup s car mall for repYment. Followup m.r. motors for repayment. Followup namah road wheels for stock audit. One agrement done today 2maro disbursement will be done. Followup 3 files under process with bankars and dealers. One new file recd from meera motors today share with kogta. Thanks regards

EDR Followup decent carz for repayment early as possible its above red line and share some file. Followup m.r.motors for repayment he paid 80% and rest within 2 days. Followup s car mall for repayment going to pay by 11 pm today only. Followup 2 files which approved with kogta bank and dealers and customars and solved the problam with few changes and recd new scheme Followup 2 other files which under process. Recd new file from s car mall. Thanks regards

EDR Followup again today decent carz continously for repayment back to back 3 vehicles and forcing to pay early. Followup m.r.motors to pay balance payment also in time. Followup s car mall to pay balance payment in time. Followup stock audit of namah road wheels Followup stock audit of vighanharta motors. 2 files disbursed today transfer will be 2maro. Recd 1 new file from vighanharta motors and share to RBL. thanks regards

Visit meera motors to collect 2 cf disbursment docus. Visit M.R. MOTORS to handover one df docus. Visit s car mall to handover one df docus. One more file disbursed and transfer to dealer. Followup 2 files under process with dealers. Followup repayment with decent carz. Followup stock audit of meera motors and its done. Followup stock audit of s car mall and its done. One payout of vighanharta motors done today. Thanks regards

EDR Met sunil at andheri stn and handover 2 cf disbursement docus to give Rto agent. Visit aarya cars meera road to handover one df docus and discuss about cf cases and jan. Scheme. Visit meera road police stn to collect signed coart stamp paper was there 2 hours and discuss next stap. Stock audit of aarya cars done. Followup 3 files under process with bankars Followup dealers to get more files and explaining about scheme.

EDR Visit namah road wheels for repayment of one vehicle completed 51 days today and asking for more files. Followup again today decent carz for repayment still in same situation not sold the vehicles trying hard to come out from this situation. Followup all dealers to give files and get the benefit of jan scheme. Thanks regards

EDR visit aarya cars meera road to collect one df docus and discuss about cf cases and listing. Visit M.R. MOTORS borivali to collect one df docus. Visit DECENT CARZ and did stock audit of all 3 vehicles myself and share in group all are at dealer place he is trying hard to sell the vehicle and promise to pay early as possible. Recd one new file from aarya cars and share in bank. Followup 3 files under process with bankars. Followup stock audit of namah road wheels. Thanks regards

EDR followup decent carz again today and force him to clear one vehicle today atleast. Stock audit of namah road wheels done today and asking repayment before 60 days. Stock audit of s car mall done. Followup 4 files under process with bankars. Followup other dealers for more files. Thanks regards

Visit namah road wheels for repayment of df reached 56 days and discuss about cf files also. Visit decent carz to handover one df docus and ask him to close another 2 vehicles early as possible. Followup stock audit with m.r. motors borivali. Followup stock audit of vighanharta motors. Followup 3 files under process with bankars and dealers and customars. Thanks regards

Followup df repayment of decent carz 2 more are pending trying hard to arrange payment to close. Followup df repayment of namah road wheels completing 57 days. Followup stock audit of vighanharta motors its done today. Followup stock audit of m.r. motors borivali. Recd one cf file from namah road wheels and share in bank. Followup 2 files under procees with banks customar and dealers. Followup all other dealers today about cf files and request them to share more files. Thanks regards

EDR Visit again decent carz today to force him to do the payment its already too late he promise to pay in this week one payment. Followup namah road wheels df repayment. Followup stock audit with m.r. motors borivali. Recd one more file from aarya cars meera rd . Followup 2 files under process with bank and customar and dealers. Thanks regards

EDR REPORT Visit namah road wheels for df repayment vehicle still not sold going to pay within few days. Followup decent carz for df repayment and forcing to manage to repay early. Followup 3 files under process with bankars customars and dealers reached at next level. Followup stock audit of m.r. motors. Followup other dealers and discuss about both df and cf cases. Thanks regards

EDR Followup decent for df repayment he closed one more today one last pending going to close soon. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment Followup m.r. motors for stock audit. Recd 2 new files. One from meera motors and one more from aarya cars Followup all under process files with bankars customars and dealers

EDR visit meera motors to handover one df docus and to collect 2 df docus and given calender also. Visit decent carz to handover one df docus and deliver calender also. Recd new file from meera motors. Followup 4 files under process with bankars dealers and customar. Followup all dealers for more files bussiness. Thanks regards

EDR Visit vighanharta motors to handover one df docus and discuss about cf files. Visit namah road wheels and request about repayment its too late and promise to pay before 30th. Followup decent carz for repayment of last vehicle. Followup all 4 files under process with banks and dealers

EDR Visit s car mall to collect one df docus and discuss about cf files and listing. Followup decent carz for repayment last df case. Followup namah road wheels for repayment. Followup stock audit of m.r.motors borivali. Recd new cf file from aarya cars. Followup 4 files under process with bankars customar and dealers Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to collect df docus. Discuss about cf cases. Handover calenders to sunil to distribute all vinayak dealers. Followup decent carz for df repayment. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment. Followup stock audit of m.r. motors borivali. Followup 3 files under process with bankars. Followup all dealers to get more dealers Thanks regards

EDR Visit decent carz for df repayment and to take gps piture of vehicle its at same place he is trying hard to close this. Followup m.r.motors for stock audit. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment. Recd one new file from meera motors. Followup 2 files under process with bankars and dealers. Thanks regards

EDR Visit namah road wheels for df repayment. Main person going to come 2maro will go 2maro again. Stock audit done of m.r. motors borivali today. Followup 3 files underprocess with bankars customars and dealers. Followup decent carz for df repayment. Followup meera motors for df repayment reached at 56 days. Followup all dealers for more cf cases Thanks regards

EDR Visit namah road wheels today at 7 in evening purpesly and i caught main person that time he promise to clear full amt by next friday. Followup meera motors for df and he paid. Followup s car mall for df going to pay by sat. Followup aarya cars he also clear today. Recd new file from vighanharta motors. Followup 3 files under process with banks dealers and customers. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to handover and to collect df docus and discuss about more files. Visit aarya cars to handover one df docus and to collect 3 df docus. Followup namah road wheels for repayment. Followup decent carz for repayment Followup s car mall for repayment. Followup 4 files under process with bankars

EDR Followup decent carz for df repayment promise to pay this week surly. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment will pay in this week. S car mall paid half today and half will pay 2maro. Followup all 4 files under process with bankars customar and dealers. Share new scheme to all dealers and dis cuss and force them to share more files Thanks regards

EDR visit meera motors to collect df docus and discuss about more files. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment will pay soon. Followup decent carz will complete in this week. Followup s car mall balance will pay within 2 days. Followup all files under process with bankars customars and dealers. Thanks regards

EDR Followup namah road wheels for df payment and forcing to pay in this week only. Asking for cf files also. Followup decent carz for for df repayment to complete early as possible. Followup all files under procees with bankars customars and dealers. Followup all dealers for cf bussiness requested them to give files. And explained again about car listing to continue. Thanks regards

EDR followup decent carz for df repayment going to pay by sunday surly bussiness are very very slow. Followup s car mall for df repayment going to pay within 2 days. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment commited for friday 2maro going to visit him. Stock audit of m.r. motors done. Followup 2 files under process with bankars customars and dealers.

EDR Visit namah road wheels twice today at 1 pm and then 7 pm he met in evening till 9 i was with him and forcing him to pay today only he is arranging going to pay soon. Followup decent carz for df repayment . Followup s car mall for df repayment. Recd new file from vighanharta and share in bNk. Followup all other files with bankars. Thanks tegards

EDR Visit namah road wheels for df repayment and recd 2 cheques of diffrent dates. Followup decent carz for df repayment. Followup s car mall for df repayment. Followup m.r.motors for df repayment. Recd one new file from meera motors . Followup all files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Visit vighanharta motors to handover and to collect df docus and discuss about cf cases and listing also. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment and transfered 2 lacs rest will be soon. Followup decent carz for df repayment. Followup s car mall for df repayment. Followup all files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR visit m.r.motors borivali to handover one df docus and to collect one df docus and discuss about cf files and listing. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment going to pay soon. Followup all files under process with bankars customars and dealers Followup decent carz for df repayment last payment going to pay soon. S car mall paid part payment rest will be soon Thanks regards

EDR Visit namah road wheels for repayment forcing him pay soon. Followup decent carz for df repayment still vehicle is not sold. Followup s car mall for balance df repayment going to close soon. Stock audit of arya cars done. Followup all 4 files under process with bankars and customars. Followup all dealers and forcing for listing. Thanks regards

EDR visit namah road wheels twice today afternoon then in evening for df repayment. Visit decent carz for df last balance will pay soon. Followup s car mall for df repayment. Stock audit of meera motors done. Followup 4 files under process with bankars Followup all dealers for cf cases and listing plateform. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to collect one df docus. Visit namah road wheels twice today i caught him in evening and he promised to pay within 2 days. 2 vehicles audit done today of meera motors. One new file recd from meera motors and share in bank. Followup 3 files under process with bankars. Followup all dealers for cf cases and listing. Thanks regards

EDR Visit s car mall to handover one df docus and discuss about cf cases and listing. Visit again namah road wheels for df repayment promise to pay tonight. Followup 2 files under process with bankars customars and dealers. Followup other dealers to get more dealers. Thanks regards

EDR Visit vighanharta motors to collect 2 df docus and discuss about cf cases and force him for listing all vehicles. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment and transfer part payment rest will be soon. One file approved of meera motor. Followup other files with bankars and customars. Followup all dealers for more files. Thanks regards

EDR Visit namah road wheels for df repayment in evening and he promise to pay 2maro. Visit decent carz for stock stock audit i persanally took the piture vehicle at same address not sold yet. Stock audit of s car mall done today only. Followup 2 files under process very hard with bankers. After very hard work bankar reject very easily. Followup all other dealers for files very seriously . Followup dream car hub for next instalment. He is in gujrat coming back on 25th then he will pay. I decided and talked with robin 2maro will go meera rd police to meet insp. Thanks regards

EDR Visit aarya cars meera road to handover 2 df docus and to collect one df docus. Aarya cars share one new file. Aarya cars listed 38 vehicles today. Visit meera road police stn and met police insp And again i requested him to call dealer. He called him and told him to pay in time always. Visit decent carz and finally he cleared high eging today and he apply new dpr i collected the same docus. Followup all three files under process with bankars. Followup namah road wheels for df repayment. Thanks regards

EDR Visit decent carz to handover one df docus and discuss about cf cases and listing more than 20 vehicles he listed. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment requested him to pay in time. One new file recd from meera motors and share in bank. Followup all files with banks customars and dealers very hard. Add one new dealer danish motors for cf only right now and share first file. Thanks regards

EDR Visit m.r.motors to collect one df docus and ask him to send all inventry. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment in evening again promise to pay today some amt but still not paid. Followup dream car hub for next instalment going to pay today but still not. Recd one more new file from new dealer. Followup all files under process few rejected. Followup stock audit of meera motors. Thanks regards

EDR visit aarya cars to collect and to handover df docus and discuss about cf and listing. Visit meera road police stn yo meet police insp. He called dealer and dealer paid 3rd instalment. Visit meera motors to collect one df docus. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment and force him to pay. One file approved 2maro will be disburse. Followup 3 files under process. Thanks regards

EDR VISIT m.r.motors to collect one df docus. Visit namah road wheels first at 4 pm then 7 pm and so much about df repayment with me and robin. Wait till monday. One file disburse today of meera motors. Followup 2 files under process. Followup stock audit of aarya cars and meera motors. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to collect one cf docus. Visit namah road wheels twice till 8 pm was with him. 2maro some result will come. Stock audit done of aarya cars. New file recd from m.r. motors meera rd first time and share in bank. Followup all files under process. Thanks regards

EDR Visit m.r.motors borivali to handover one df docus and share some inventry. Visit decent carz to collect 2 df docus. Visit namah road wheels at 3.30 and till 6.30 i was there so many things happened fight between robin and dealer i made them cool now on friday either he will pay 2 lacs or handover vehicle and he handover me one more vehicle docus for support. Handover one cf docus to sunil at andheri stn to give rto. One urgent docus given by my wife from home to vighanharta motors. Stock audit done of aarya cars done. Followup all files under process with banks. Few rejected today. Thanks regards

EDR First half in hospital. 2nd half first visited namah road wheels and share gps piture of our vehicle it was same place. Talk to dealer to to pay by friday. Recd new file from car pm automotive for new vehicle loan. Share in bank. One more new dealer added for cf cases and one file from amravati is going on. Followup all files underprocess with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to handover 2 df docus. Visit namah road wheels twice today first in afternoon. Vehicle at same place trying to arrange payment. Again visit late evening vehicle there only by 2maro evening he will pay Followup all files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Visit s car mall to handover one docus and to collect one docus. Visit again today namah road wheels st 7.30 pm talk to him to pay early as possible. Vehicle at right place. Took the gps piture and share in group. Recd 2 files from meera motors. Recd one file from dream car hub. Followup all files under process with bankars Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to collect one df docus and ask inventry. Visit decent carz to collect one df docus and discuss about cf cases and inventry. One new file recd from new dealer first time. Followup all files under process with bankars. Followup stock audit. Thanks regards

EDR Visit namah road wheels for df repayment and stock audit. Visit decent carz to discuss about cf cases and share more inventry. Recd 2 more new files from meera motors Followup all files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Good evening neeraj ji I had eye surgery few days i will handle my work from home working with one eye other one is covered. Followup nanah road wheels for df payment forcing him to complete early. Followup meera motors for df repayment one is paid 2nd going to pay by 2maro. Stock audit of m.r motors done today. One file approved today of meers motors valuation will done 2maro. Followup all others files with bankers and dealers. My wife is helping to make the call. Thanks regards

EDR visit meera motors to collect 2 df docus. Visit aarya cars to handover 38 vehicles car scope and discuss about cf cases. Visit meera road police to meet inspetor again and inform him that dealer not paying in time. Visit namah road wheels for next and final payment. 2 files approved. Will disburse within 2 days. One new file recd from meera motors. Followup all files underprocess with bankars. Stock audit of aarya cars done. Thanks regards

EDR visit m.r.motors borivali to collect one df docus. One disbursement sappose to do by Au bank but due to limit block it was not happened.dealer calling continously.i requested him wait till 2maro Followup all files under process. Few rejected. One file approved in mahendra. Thanks regards

EDR visit new dealer today and discuss about df and cf cases.discuss about company rules. Dealer name is MUMBAI ROADSTER. One case is ready for disbursment from AU bank One new file recd from meera road today Followup all files underprocess with bankars Followup df repayment with dealers. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors to hand over one df docus. One stock audit of meera motors done myself today. One cf disbursement done today to meera motors from au bank. Visit namah road wheels for df repayment met his brother again and ask to pay before 31st. One new file recd from dream car hub and share in bank. Followup all files under process with bankars. Thanks regards

EDR Visit meera motors and collected CF docus. Visit aarya cars to handover 3 Df docus and collect one df docus. Recd one Cf file from aarya cars and share in bank. Visit namah road for repayment promise to pay on 3rd or 4th completely. Followup decent carz for stock audit. Thanks regards

EDR VISIT m.r.motors borivali and collect df docus. Discuss about cf cases. Visit vighanharta motors Handover and collect df docus. Asked cf files. Followup 4 files under process with bankars. Stock audit done od decent carz. Start following up all dealers for april cf files. Thanks regards

EDR handover cf docus to sunil at andheri dtn Visit namah road wheels going to pay today. Recd one new file. One file approved 2maro disburse. 4 files under process followup with bankars and customars. Followup all dealers to recieve more files Followup repayment with meera motors. Thanks regards

EDR Visit m.r.motors handover 2 df docus. Visit namah road wheels payment done today myself went to bank for rtgs. One file approved disburse not done today Followup 4 files under process. Thanks regards

EDR 7th april Visit namah road wheels twice today afternoon and evening he requested again will complete within 2 to 3 days. Followup 3 files under process. Followup all dealers to get more files. Followup dreamcar hub promise to pay 2maro. Followup stock audit of meera motors
